original_text: When you are angry, do not do anything bad as a result. Once the day comes to an end, do not continue to be angry.
korean_text: 분을 내어도 죄를 짓지 말며 해가 지도록 분을 품지 말고

sentences.original_text: do not do anything bad as a result
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과로 나쁜 일을 하지 마라

sentences.original_text: Once the day comes to an end
do not continue to be angry
